## dragging.BlockDragStrategy.endDrag() method

Cleans up any state at the end of the drag. Applies any pending connections.

**Signature:**

```typescript
endDrag(e?: PointerEvent): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | PointerEvent | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

void
